column4: how can i remove all files that are installed from a deb manually?
dpkg --remove --purge [package]  (or something)
That will remove the entire package
iwant a list of filenames and folders and remove them by rm -r with the terminal. i cant remove the package with synaptic and dpkg and apt-get
why can't you remove the package?
i want to remove vmware-player. when i try to reinstall purge remopve or whatever it tries to reconfigure and turns out an error code ending up being still installed
What happens when you type "apt-get -f install" on the console?
do you know anything else i can try?
